title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a simple pull/run workflow.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, and browsers via the Ollama REST endpoint.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs and embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-model chats, code highlighting, and RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama offering synchronous & asynchronous APIs and utilities for Spring Boot.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for integrating Ollama into Rails or plain Ruby apps.

title: chainlit-ollama
summary: Chainlit cookbook showing how to build conversational AI apps backed by Ollama models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that uses a local Ollama model for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with fuzzy model search, chat history, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal pod autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for running Ollama containerized with CUDA acceleration.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri-based desktop GUI for Ollama with real-time streaming chat and model management.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial C# / .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and integration examples for ASP.NET Core.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB and LangChain for Q&A over documents.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams responses from Ollama models in chat channels with slash commands and moderation.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets users query local Ollama models for note summarization and Q&A inside Obsidian.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing TypeScript-first client for Ollama with full API coverage and ESM/CJS builds.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package offering lightweight Python bindings and CLI helpers for interacting with the Ollama server.
